name: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4信息泄露漏洞（CNVD-2025-29150）
product: ["Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2 <=1.19.5", "Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4 <=1.19.5"]
description: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4都是美国Azure Access Technology公司的一种网络门禁控制器。Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4存在信息泄露漏洞，该漏洞是由于HTTP标头中包裹的错误消息引起的。攻击者可利用该漏洞获取敏感信息。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://azure-access.com/security-advisories/
patch: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4信息泄露漏洞（CNVD-2025-29150）的补丁
